about_the_game:
Explore and share Stan & Jan Berenstain’s classic, "The Berenstain Bears Get in a Fight", adapted from the original "Berenstain Bears" storybook into an interactive animated adventure! The Berenstain Bear family bring the story alive, offering an easy to digest reading mode which is fully animated and voiced. Increase the challenge and the fun with an interactive at-your-own-pace option with lots of bonuses and secrets to discover!

The story centers around a growing feud between Brother Bear and Sister Bear. Normally, Brother Bear and Sister Bear are polite, cooperate quite well together and share appropriately. One gray morning however, they did not get along at all! Things go from bad to worse as the young bears are increasingly irritated with one another. Even Papa Bear is getting fed up with the shouting! How can they resolve this dispute, and perhaps learn a valuable lesson?

Since it's first release in 1995, Living Books' rendition of "The Berenstain Bears Get in a Fight" has been enjoyed by countless children. Step-by-step, the reader will find the story is full of all the entertaining scenes that have made Stan & Jan Berenstain’s "Berenstain Bears" books enduring classics. All while providing new ways to interact with the book again and again.

  • Both interactive and story modes suitable for different levels of skill.

  • Interact with the pictures and discover hidden scenes.

  • An easy-to-use point and click interface.

  • Attractive animations bring the characters to life.

  • Fully voiced as you read! Chock full of memorable scenes!

  • A revitalized re-release compatible with modern platforms.
